result.execSummary:
The defendant John D James was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. John D James is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • John D James was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, John D James with Attorney Donna Burger appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Holly D. Wood Webster.  Janell Evan - Clerk.  10:14 am. and 14CF271, 14TR4854,  15CF204

Burger w/draws motion.  Parties have agreement.   14CF271 - plead to ct. 1 OWI, dismiss ct 2 and .  3 yrs prob, 270 days jail, 36 mo rev, IID, AODA & Driver safety plan, $1789.  Dismiss 14TR4854
15CF204 - plead to ct. 3, impose and stay 90 days, 12 mo prob, AODA & follw up, $243 and $200, dismiss ct. 1 & 2 and 15CT249

Def waives rights, pleads no contest to 14CF271 ct. 1, pleads no contest to 15CF204 - ct. 3,  parties stip to facts

COURT:  finds waiver vol, finds def guilty - 15cF204 - ct 3, parties stip to facts
90 days jail - imposed and stayed, 2 days credit
12 mo probation, AODA & follow up.  Provide DNA sample
$243 cc and $200 DNA - 60 DTP or pay plan
Dismiss ct 1 and 2

COURT: finds waiver vol, finds def guilty - 14CF271 - ct. 1 - 6th offence
w/held sent, 3 yrs probation ( concurrent)
270 days jail w/ Huber to begin by 12/29/15 at 5 pm - 3 days credit 
36 mo rev, AODA & Driver safety plan, IID required
$1789 - 60 DPT or pay plan
Dismiss ct. 2 and 14tR4854

Dismiss 15CF249
